content.p: UoNARI-Malaysia (UoNARI-M) serves to integrate Asia-focused researchers (faculty and students) at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. Headlined by the unifying theme of TransAsia, UoNARI-M sits comfortably across disciplinary boundaries and encourages conversation and debate that reaches beyond academic walls. TransAsia includes and welcomes researchers working on the following sub-themes: UoNARI-M also seeks external engagements and will actively pursue opportunities for research partnerships and joint conference and seminar organising. telephone: +603 8924 8000 fax: +603 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
